changes: Updated reschedule button to allow the user to choose the time for the new lesson.
Added ability to import lessons into the current week.
Added ability to export the current week's lessons.
Fixed bug where you could not delete lessons if popups for the site were disabled on the browser.
Fixed bug where login tokens would not expire at the correct time.
Updated reschedule button to allow the user to choose the date for the new lesson.
Added the TTGE logo to the navigation bar.
Fixed bug where Saturday lessons would sometimes not populate when adding to the current week.
LessonCards now have a fixed size.
Added a button to copy a lesson into the next week at the same time.
Fixed bug where updated the date of a lesson within the same week context would not move the lesson visually.
